Uses of Interface
plugin.PluginListener

  • Packages that use PluginListener 
    Package Description
    gui
    The gui package contains all the elements that will be used to create and use the graphical user interface
    plugin
    Package of the plugin structure

    • Uses of PluginListener in gui

      Classes in gui that implement PluginListener 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  HelpMenu
      The class HelpMenu generate each item in the help menu, depends of the plugins found.
      class  ToolsMenu
      The class ToolsMenu generates each item in the Tools menu, depends of the plugins found.

    • Uses of PluginListener in plugin

      Classes in plugin that implement PluginListener 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  PluginAddedLogger
      The class PluginAddedLogger will only be a class that prints in the console
      Methods in plugin that return types with arguments of type PluginListener 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<PluginListener> PluginFinder.getListeners() 
      Methods in plugin with parameters of type PluginListener 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void PluginFinder.addPluginListener(PluginListener listener)
      The method that adds a plugin listener to the list
      void PluginFinder.removePluginListener(PluginListener listener)
      The method that removes a plugin listener from the list
